entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then clear. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 except minus 3 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Low plus 2 except minus 3 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
